title: Unclear where to set Zoom level
author: rohrkemper
body_snippet: I'm working sometimes on a 4K monitor and sometimes on a 5K 2K monitor. I'd like to have the zoom set to 200%. I've seen some very specific issues related to this question, but no general explanation. Could someone help me get started even if there's no optimal solution? I have a very high bandwidth connection. Which other settings would you recommend to have the best display quality possible?
